update.description:
Some fixes to solve problems on subt CI:

* Report test results usind DSL
* Define GAZEBO\_PLUGIN\_PATH
* Use `subt_gazebo competition.launch` in smoke test 

I’ve tested this PR in 

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=subt-ci-pr_any-bionic-amd64&build=12)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci-pr\_any-bionic-amd64/12/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci-pr_any-bionic-amd64/12/))

There are a couple of issues:

1. The second test fails because gazebo was not finished properly after the first one. We can use the code in gazebo\_ros\_pkgs ros2 branch to achieve the correct tear down.
2. The first test complains about 

    [Err] [Plugin.hh:180] Failed to load plugin /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/subt-ci-pr_any-bionic-amd64/ws/install/lib/librotors_gazebo_ros_interface_plugin.so: libmav_msgs.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

Not sure why since the file seems to be in the right place and LD\_LIBRARY\_PATH and GAZEBO\_PLUGIN\_PATH seems fine to me:

    LD_LIBRARY_PATH: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/subt-ci-pr_any-bionic-amd64/ws/install/lib:/opt/ros/melodic/lib:/usr/local/nvidia/lib:/usr/local/nvidia/lib64
    + echo 'GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/subt-ci-pr_any-bionic-amd64/ws/install/lib:'
    GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/subt-ci-pr_any-bionic-amd64/ws/install/lib:
    + find . -name libmav_msgs.so
    ./install/lib/libmav_msgs.so
update.title: Fix tests in subt CI
